sourcesContent:
Authorized Generic Medicine List

S.no Proprietary name Dosage form Strength NDA Applicant Name Date Authorized Generic Entered the Market
{{i}}. {{item.name}} {{item.dosage}} {{item.strength}} {{item.ndaapp}} 2023-01-01
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-generic', templateUrl: './generic.component.html', styleUrls: ['./generic.component.css'] }) export class GenericComponent { constructor(private http: HttpClient) {} list : any[]=[] ngOnInit() : void{ const response1=this.http.post("http://localhost:3000/generic/getgenmeds", { observe: 'response' }); response1.subscribe(response=>{ const status = response.status console.log(status) if(status==="success"){ this.list=Array.isArray(response.data) ? response.data : [response.data] console.log(this.list) } }) } }
